so guys im making a DEAD SPACE ARMOR, what im going to show now is just an early stage prototype and i could use some ideas on what to add, change or remove, while im doing some fine adjustments to walking and armor servos, don't be shy every info/idea is greatly apriciated like always ^^

Hello I'm having trouble to understand how the sequencer works : When I have multiple states (In the sequencer menu),

it appear that I only have 1 state with the green arrow before its name and not 2 like in the [@Ziw](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135292-ziw/)'s gif in the 1st post..

How to change that to use multiple states ?
Amazing Creations [@Tirehtoori R.I.P](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/149732-tirehtoori-rip/)

I have a problem getting the sequencer icon to show up in the toolbar in the craft editor.   

For some reason sequencer randomly breaks without having to install more mods and does work even if I reinstall the entire mod or get rid of all my other mods like this  
![unknown.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/132478131490521089/412406963847168000/unknown.png)  

Not even leaving it like that after reinstalling makes the sequencer icon reappear in the toolbar.   

Now this has happened to me before but I can't fix it this time and so far my only option is to reinstall the whole game.  

It was fine working with the exact same craft on the exact same modpack a week ago.   
![rlOrjuR.png](https://i.imgur.com/rlOrjuR.png)  

Sequencer toolbar icon doesn't show up even I remove every single mod other than infernal robotics and modulemanager.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-02-12T18:56:54Z" title="02/12/2018 06:56  PM" data-short="6 yr">February 12, 2018</time> by Colonel Cbplayer**
Hello, the text areas seems to trigger hotkeys ie 5 for changing camera mod when using WASD mod.

> Hello, the text areas seems to trigger hotkeys ie 5 for changing camera mod when using WASD mod.

There was some leftovers on UI that were not disabled clicktrough and key pass trough usage of IR UI. Make some screenshots and provide log file, it will be easier for devs to fix it when they grab some free time for it.

Sequencer is also reworked, so it is possible that you have discovered some new bug. Try to make some screenshots and catch log. Report it in linked IR next thread to prevent things left unnoticed. [@Rudolf Meier](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/176740-rudolf-meier/) could tell you more what is going on.
